data.title: Latest National News, Videos & Photos - ABC News - ABC News
data.meta_description: Get the  latest breaking news across the U.S. on ABCNews.com
data.text:
Israel preps for attacks, UAW files labor charges against Trump and Musk

Israel braces for retaliatory attacks. Plus, Trump and Musk’s X conversation could lead to federal charges. And, Journey faces legal woes ahead of the band's tour. Our panel weighs in.

Black bear attacks child in tent on Montana campground

The bear was shot and killed the next day, officials said.

UAW files federal labor charges against Donald Trump and Elon Musk

In an interview with Musk, Trump appeared to endorse firing striking workers.

Convicted murderer escapes on way to hospital: Police

Ramone Alston, 30, was convicted of fatally shooting a 1-year-old girl in 2015.

Man dies of heat exposure in Death Valley park

A man died of heat exposure in California's Death Valley National Park, marking the park's second heat-related death this summer, according to the National Park Service.

Spice celebrates groundbreaking success, new album 'Mirror 25'

Spice discusses her music career and expresses her desire to pursue acting.

5 diagnosed with Legionnaires' disease in New Hampshire

Exposure to Legionnaires' disease can cause serious pneumonia and even death.

Convicted murderer escapes North Carolina hospital

A convicted murderer is on the loose after escaping from a North Carolina hospital Tuesday morning, officials said.

Mom accidentally hits 12-year-old daughter with car at school drop-off: Officials

The crash occurred when the mom dropped off her daughter on the street near her Sarasota middle school for the first day of school, according to the Florida Highway Patrol and the school district.

National headlines from ABC News

Catch up on the developing stories making headlines.

Mom accidentally hits 12-year-old daughter with car at school drop-off

The girl was picking up pens from under the car when she was hit.

Michigan man accused of fatally shooting his neighbor following argument

Devereaux Christopher Johnson, 47, of Canton, was arraigned Monday on first-degree murder in connection with the shooting, the Wayne County Prosecutor's Office said.

New York AG warns tech giants against allowing election-related misinformation

Letitia James said the companies' AI tools have become "easy to use and misuse."

5 diagnosed with Legionnaires' disease in New Hampshire, health officials say

Exposure to the bacteria can cause serious pneumonia and even death.

Ex-deputy charged in Massey killing faced misconduct claim in 2022 arrest

The woman alleged Sean Grayson exposed her on a hospital bed, which he denied.

ABC News Live Prime: Monday, August 12, 2024

The U.S. military sends a submarine to the Middle East amid heightened tensions. Plus, an earthquake rattles parts of Los Angeles. Then, Ukraine escalates its attack inside Russia.

ABC News Live Rundown: Monday, August 12, 2024

Stay up to date on the developing stories making headlines.

Trial begins for official accused of murdering journalist

Robert Telles allegedly stabbed Jeff German to death in September 2022.

Musk to interview Trump, Middle East tensions, and stunning Olympics finale

Former President Donald Trump to sit for an interview with Elon Musk, Israel braces for potential attacks, and an iconic close to the Paris Olympics. Our panels weigh in on today's top headlines.

Donald Trump to sit for interview with Elon Musk

The Republican presidential nominee will have a live conversation with Musk on his social platform, X. GOP Congressman Pete Sessions joins the show.

2024 Summer Olympics close with a surprise celebrity arrival

Actor Tom Cruise showed up at the closing ceremony of the 2024 Olympics. The panel discusses the end of the Summer Games.

Woman set to stand trial for fatal shooting of Florida neighbor Ajike Owens

Owens' kids to testify as witnesses to the June 2023 incident, attorney says.

House explosion killed 2 people, caused 'millions' in damage: Authorities

The two people killed in the blast were identified by authorities on Monday.

Mother charged with murder 37 years after newborn was found dead in a dumpster

Police recently reopened the unsolved case from 1987 and used DNA to identify the mother.

Timeline: Hunter Biden under legal, political scrutiny

Prosecutors have been investigating the president's son since 2018.

If the US economy is strong, why are so many Americans struggling?

Inflation, debt and rising costs are overshadowing low unemployment and a strong GDP.

Climate Minute: Rising sea levels and flooding

Climate change is leading to flooding even without big storms.

Mother arrested 37 years after her newborn was found dead in dumpster: Police

Authorities used DNA to identify the baby's mother.

South Carolina flooding delays start of school

Flooding caused delays to the start of the school year in Ridgeville, South Carolina. ABC News' Faith Abubey reports from Dorchester County.

Romanian oligarch hired Hunter Biden to influence US policy, special counsel says

Hunter Biden's lawyers ripped the claim as "irrelevant and politically charged."

1 dead after house explosion in Maryland

The blast was reported around 6:42 a.m. in the Harford County city of Bel Air, about 32 miles north of Baltimore, according to officials.

City of Uvalde releases records from 2022 Robb Elementary shooting

The release ends a two-year legal battle with over a dozen news organizations.

Bureau of Prisons employee dies after coming into contact with 'unknown substance'

The employee was rushed to the hospital and later died.

Police, protesters clash on 10th anniversary of Michael Brown Jr.'s death

One officer remains in critical condition from his injuries, police said.

MAUI RISING: The Fight for Hawai'i's Future

In the wake of the deadly Maui wildfires, Hawaiians transform a tragedy into a grassroots movement for change fighting for a more equitable and sustainable future. Narrated by Jason Scott Lee.

Remnants of Debby exit as another tropical wave brews over central Atlantic

The remnants of Debby moved away from New Hampshire.

ABC News Live Prime: Friday, August 9, 2024

Plane crash in Brazil leaves dozens of people dead, Harris and Trump hold dueling campaign events & Michael Brown’s mother on the fight for justice.
